mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, AA.* FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD ORDER BY postID DESC) AA WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endNo}) WHERE RNUM >= #{startNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (postID, subject, userName, content, isNotice, userID) VALUES (BOARD_POSTID_SEQ.nextval, #{subject}, #{userName}, #{content}, 'true', 4)
